Package Model

Class Treatment

java.lang.Object
Model.Treatment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Treatment extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a medical treatment associated with a diagnosis.

The Treatment class stores information about medications prescribed for a specific treatment and the associated quantities.

This class implements Serializable to allow instances of Treatment to be serialized and stored persistently.

Key Features:

  • Stores the treatment ID to identify the treatment uniquely.
  • Maintains a list of medications associated with the treatment.
  • Tracks the quantities of the prescribed medications.
Since:
2024-11-17
